structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Amount of damages recoverable against local governments.
law.text: The amount of damages recoverable against a local government for death, personal injury or property damages arising out of a single accident or occurrence, or sequence of accidents or occurrences, shall not exceed the total damages suffered by plaintiff, reduced by the percentage of fault including contributory fault, attributed by the trier of fact to other parties, if any.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 224, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1988.
